description.langstring: Before starting your foreign language training, please test your computer to verify that all the necessary software is installed and functioning correctly. The Computer Test: 1) Verifies your computer's configuration and hardware (operating system, sound card, etc.). 2) Installs the components necessary for TELL ME MORE to work (Flash Player and Auralog components). 3) Displays the results of the analysis. 4) Helps you to configure your computer properly. Note: If you change computers during the training, please run the Computer Test again.
